full_summary:
Tender Notice ^[1]
------------------------------------------------

### Product Category 5: Ancillary and Lighting Products

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01008672
**Procurement Number:** 30003446

**Publication Date:** 2022-09-28
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-14 14:00:00 (Expired)

**Procurement Categories:**

* Office Furniture (GSM Code: N7110)
* Ancillary and Lighting Products

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive – Selective Tendering

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to suppliers under the following Trade Agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Project Location:**

* Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Government Department:**

* Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Marius Lacasse
* Email: Marius.Lacasse@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

**Tender Description:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking tenders for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture in Quebec, QC by March 1, 2023. This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other trade agreements. Suppliers must be pre-qualified and have a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) to participate.

**Supporting Documents:**

* Annex E (Standardized Request for Proposal) ENG: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/480fc846828605ad3131a28f9519d225/30003446_-_ws_annex_e_standard_rfb_en_final.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/480fc846828605ad3131a28f9519d225/30003446_-_ws_annex_e_standard_rfb_en_final.pdf)
* Annex E (Standardized Request for Proposal) FRA: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/621c3ed52961e5b74fdd69dea2acb70d/30003446_ws_annexe_e_-_standard_fr_final
